description: To address CVE-2023-36427, which affects multiple Windows 10 and Windows 11 versions, system administrators should implement security updates available for the affected builds. The updates are relevant for Windows 10 versions 21H2 and 22H2, and Windows 11 versions 21H2 and 23H2. These updates can be found under KB-5032189, KB-5032190, and KB-5032192 which provide critical mitigations against potential elevation of privilege scenarios. The respective update packages are available for download at the following links: KB5032189 - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032189, KB5032190 - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190, and KB5032192 - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192. Ensuring that these updates are applied promptly will help secure systems against exploitation attempts related to this vulnerability.
